titleStmt.title: To the honnorable the knights, cittizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled the humble petition of George Carew, Esquire administrator of the goods and chattles of Sr. William Courten, Knight, deceased (with his will annexed), John White, and James Boeve, of London, marchants, on the behalfe of themselves and diverse others, His Majesties good subjects of England.
titleStmt.author: Carew, George, Esq.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
